about_the_game:
Set sail on an epic journey with Kaetram, the animated 2D MMORPG where your medieval fantasies come to life. Every corner of this vast world is a treasure chest of enigmas; each piece a part of a much larger story.

Equip your character with an array of exquisite items, showcasing your distinctive flair with heroic customization. Whether you wield the strength of a knight, the knowledge of a mage, or the precision of an archer, your character is yours to define.


Combat offers you a variety of ways to engage in battles with monsters, bosses and other players. You can utilize a variety of weapons, skills and armor to defeat your enemies, make your own choices to develop your offensive and defensive skills.

Embark on a multitude of adventures as you master life skills like lumberjacking, alchemy, mining, fishing and more!
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

Set sail on an epic journey with Kaetram, the animated 2D MMORPG where your medieval fantasies come to life. Every corner of this vast world is a treasure chest of enigmas; each piece a part of a much larger story.

Equip your character with an array of exquisite items, showcasing your distinctive flair with heroic customization. Whether you wield the strength of a knight, the knowledge of a mage, or the precision of an archer, your character is yours to define.


Combat offers you a variety of ways to engage in battles with monsters, bosses and other players. You can utilize a variety of weapons, skills and armor to defeat your enemies, make your own choices to develop your offensive and defensive skills.

Embark on a multitude of adventures as you master life skills like lumberjacking, alchemy, mining, fishing and more!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® Processor G4400
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 510
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-7100
  • Memory: 1536 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 630
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX Yosemite (10.10)
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11 Big Sur
  • Processor: Intel or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 1536 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Kaetram

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® Processor G4400
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 510
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-7100
  • Memory: 1536 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 630
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: A cross-platform 2D pixel-based MMORPG set in medieval times with many turns and twists to spice up your adventure. Join other players in your adventure of defeating bosses, completing quests, discovering achievements, and so much more.
supported_languages:
English*, Dutch, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Filipino
*languages with full audio support
